bibdata.title: IEEE Standard for Wireless Access in Vehicular Environments (WAVE)--Multi-Channel Operation
Corrigendum 1: Miscellaneous Corrections
IEEE Standard for Wireless Access in Vehicular Environments (WAVE)--Multi-Channel Operation - Corrigendum 1: Miscellaneous Corrections

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

bibdata.abstract: Multi-channel wireless radio operations, Wireless Access in Vehicular Environments (WAVE) mode, medium access control, and physical layers, including parameters for priority access, channel switching and routing, management services, and primitives designed for multichannel operations are described in this standard.

Multi-channel wireless radio operations, Wireless Access in Vehicular Environments (WAVE) mode, medium access control, and physical layers, including parameters for priority access, channel switching and routing, management services, and primitives designed for multichannel operations are described in this standard.

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers
